New Records: Paul van Meekeren took four wickets for 23 runs in a fiery spell
Key Match Events: Bangladesh's collapse to 70 for six inside 18 overs
Dutch bowlers extracted bounce and heat
Pre-Game Insights: Scott Edwards won the toss and chose to bat
Bangladesh allowed the Dutch lower order to accumulate 74 runs in the final 10 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Scott Edwards praised the team's fielding and performance
The Netherlands moved ahead of England in the World Cup table
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are now last in the World Cup table
The result leaves the reigning champions England 10th
